00011 ElapsedTime::ElapsedTime()
00012 {
00013     // init StartTime
00014     Reset();
00015 }
00016 
00018 ElapsedTime::~ElapsedTime()
00019 {
00020 }
00021 
00023 void ElapsedTime::Reset()
00024 {
00025     struct timeval CurrentTimeOfDay;
00026 
00027     // retrieve the current time
00028     gettimeofday(&CurrentTimeOfDay, NULL);
00029 
00030     // Compute the time in ms since epoque
00031     StartTime = CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_sec * 1000 + CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_usec/1000;
00032 }
00033 
00035 unsigned int ElapsedTime::Get(bool DoReset /* = false */)
00036 {
00037     struct timeval CurrentTimeOfDay;
00038     unsigned int   CurrentTime;
00039     unsigned int   CurrentElapsedTime;
00040 
00041     // retrieve the current time
00042     gettimeofday(&CurrentTimeOfDay, NULL);
00043 
00044     // Compute the time in ms since epoque
00045     CurrentTime = CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_sec * 1000 + CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_usec/1000;
00046 
00047     CurrentElapsedTime = CurrentTime - StartTime;
00048 
00049     if ( DoReset == true )
00050     {
00051         // Reset the Time and return elapsed time
00052         StartTime = CurrentTime;
00053     }
00054 
00055     return CurrentElapsedTime;
00056 }
